participant_1.background:
I love to go paddle boarding with my friends because it's a fun and active way to spend time together
i m the oldest of three boys.
I like to play video games to de-stress after a long day of welding.
I can't do gymnastics if I were blind because I need to see my surroundings and the equipment to be able to do them safely.
i hate winter and the cold.

participant_2.background:
I like to play outside with my brothers on the Fourth of July.
i work for a small , family owned restaurant.
My longest relationship was four years and I'm not sure if I'm ready for another one.
i have taken formal music lessons since i was 5.
my favorite class is painting.

content.text: What's your favorite way to stay cool in the summer?
I usually go swimming with my friends or play outside on the fourth of July.
That sounds really fun! I love to go paddle boarding with my friends because it's a great way to get some exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
That's sounds really cool! I've never been paddle boarding before, but it looks like a lot of fun.
It is really fun! I'm glad I got into it.
What's your favorite thing to do during the winter?
I hate the winter! I love playing video games to de-stress after a long day of welding.
That's a good way to relax. I like to play video games too.
My favorite video game is The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.
That's a great game! I love the open world aspect of it.
Me too! It's so much fun to explore.
Yeah, it's one of my favorite games of all time.
Cool! I'm glad we have something in common.
